title: Daily Life of an Immortal Cat in the Human World - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Slice of Life
tags: Female Protagonist   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Transformation Ability
description:
I am a cat, a demon cat with skills acquired throughout the millennia.

I have a master possessing great strength, who adores money as much as he does his own life. His most cherished belonging is the Five Spirit Mirror that can grant a single wish every  five centuries.


One day, albeit only due to curiosity, I accidentally lost the Five Spirit Mirror after taking it out to play……

As a result, Master said some meaningful and heartfelt words to me: Scram! If you can’t find the Five Spirit Mirror, then don’t come back to see me!!

That, because, so as a result, I set off……>
